languages.text: Когда это существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, каждый противник со свойством {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Перекрестный огонь{/g} в радиусе 8 клеток совершает против него дополнительную атаку.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, every enemy with the {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Crossfire{/g} feature in a 8-cell radius makes an additional attack against this creature.

traits.locale_text: Когда это существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, каждый противник со свойством {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Перекрестный огонь{/g} в радиусе 8 клеток совершает против него дополнительную атаку.

languages.text: La primera vez que esta criatura sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, todos los enemigos con la característica {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Fuego cruzado{/g} en un radio de 8 casillas lanzan un ataque adicional contra esta criatura.

traits.locale_text: La primera vez que esta criatura sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, todos los enemigos con la característica {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Fuego cruzado{/g} en un radio de 8 casillas lanzan un ataque adicional contra esta criatura.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ラウンド{/g}中にこの生物が初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Round}攻撃{/g}されるたび、半径8セル内にいる、{g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}十字砲火{/g}効果を持つすべての敵は、この生物に対して追加攻撃を行う。
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, every enemy with the {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Crossfire{/g} feature in a 8-cell radius makes an additional attack against this creature.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ラウンド{/g}中にこの生物が初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Round}攻撃{/g}されるたび、半径8セル内にいる、{g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}十字砲火{/g}効果を持つすべての敵は、この生物に対して追加攻撃を行う。

languages.text: 每当此生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}被首次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，8格内所有拥有{g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}交叉火力{/g}特性的敌人都会同时对此生物发起额外攻击。
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, every enemy with the {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Crossfire{/g} feature in a 8-cell radius makes an additional attack against this creature.

traits.locale_text: 每当此生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}被首次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，8格内所有拥有{g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}交叉火力{/g}特性的敌人都会同时对此生物发起额外攻击。

languages.text: Wird diese Kreatur in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erstmals {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, führen alle mit {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Im Kreuzfeuer{/g} belegten Gegner in einem Radius von 8 Zellen einen weiteren Angriff auf diese Kreatur aus.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, every enemy with the {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Crossfire{/g} feature in a 8-cell radius makes an additional attack against this creature.

traits.locale_text: Wird diese Kreatur in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erstmals {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, führen alle mit {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Im Kreuzfeuer{/g} belegten Gegner in einem Radius von 8 Zellen einen weiteren Angriff auf diese Kreatur aus.

languages.text: Lorsque cette créature est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, chaque ennemi doté de la caractéristique {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Feu croisé{/g} dans un rayon de 8 cases lui inflige une attaque supplémentaire.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, every enemy with the {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Crossfire{/g} feature in a 8-cell radius makes an additional attack against this creature.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque cette créature est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, chaque ennemi doté de la caractéristique {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Feu croisé{/g} dans un rayon de 8 cases lui inflige une attaque supplémentaire.

languages.text: Bu yaratık bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} 8 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Çapraz Ateş{/g} özelliğine sahip tüm düşmanlar, bu yaratığa karşı ilave bir saldırı gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, every enemy with the {g|f:3558858b09334f7f802d3a124c91a88b}Crossfire{/g} feature in a 8-cell radius makes an additional attack against this creature.
